modName: Toon Indie Skyrim ENB for Weak Computer
summary: This ENB turn the Skyrim into the toon fantasy world.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Please download Terrible Textures for Weak Computers first.

[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Do you like the style of "JOURNEY"?
 [/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Or "Firewatch"?
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Or"Hardland"?
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Or "The Witness"
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Or "Zelda"?
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Do you want to play the "Skyrim" looks like these beautiful indie-games?[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]
Do you want to run beautiful Skyrim on your low-spec PC? [/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]
Well then, try THIS!!

[/size][/color][/b]This ENB was made for the[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22777/] Terrible Textures for Weak Computers by gutlessVADER[/url].
With the Terrible Textures for Weak Computers (and other great mods),  this ENB turn the Skyrim's realistic graphics into toon like fantasy graphics.Also this ENB is performance friendly. Even lower PC can run this TISENB. 


[b][size=4]Required MOD[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22777/]Terrible Textures for Weak Computers by gutlessVADER[/url] [b](IMPORTANT)
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855/]Shadows by HHaleyy[/url] (This ENB was adjusted for Shadows.)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61680/]No More Blinding Fog by WankingSkeever[/url]  (Without this MOD some areas will be too bright.)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29253/?e]Remove Interior Fog V2 by rgabriel15B[/url] (Without this MOD, interiors will be too bright.).[b][size=4]


[/size][/b][b][size=4]Installation
[/size][/b]0.Install the Terrible Textures for Weak Computers by gutlessVADER.1.Copy the d3d9.dll file of ENB v0.113(wow! [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm]You can get this from here[/url]) to your Skyrim folder.
2.Copy and paste to your Skyrim folder with all the files in a Toon Indie Skyrim ENB for Weak Computer folder.
3.Edit your Skyrimprefs.ini like this:

FloatPointRenderTarget=1 

4: If your PC is powerful enough, edit your skyrimprefs.ini and set the following value make more beautiful result:

bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1


Uninstallation
Just delete any files from Toon Indie Skyrim for Weak Computer and d3d9.dll file.


Notion
Core settings of this ENB is [BLOOM] part and [ENVIRONMENT] part.Intense Bloom, intense Ambient Lighting, no Specular, dense Fog and intense Fog Curve. 
So if you want to use the more recent versions of ENB(that require the more high-spec pc but can use the more precise and beautiful settings.), applying those concepts make good result.


Thanks[b]
[/b][b]This ENB was inspired by this [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrim/comments/3g49ci/toon_skyrim_mod_test_what_do_you_think/]Reddit thread[/url]. [/b][b]This ENB didn't work without Terrible Textures for Weak Computers. Terrible Textures is not actually terrible. It's great.[/b][b]
[/b][b]And thank you to visiting this MOD and Enduring my awful english. Hehe.   


[/b]ATTENTION

currently all of the files that was published recently is not downloadable.
So I write the script of my enbseriese.ini here.
download enb v0.113 and install the files inside the wrapperversion folder, and open enbseriese,ini, copy and past below script.
Maybe it gave you similar result. 

[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=false
InitProxyFunctions=false
ProxyLibrary=sweetfx_d3d9.dll
[GLOBAL]
AdditionalConfigFile=userconfig.ini
UseEffect=true
[FIX]
ForceFakeVideocard=false
FixGameBugs=true
FixParallaxBugs=false
ForceSingleCoreCPU=false
IgnoreThreadManagement=true
IgnoreThreadPriority=true
AntiBSOD=true
[GAME]
SpeedHack=false
[MULTIHEAD]
ForceVideoAdapterIndex=false
VideoAdapterIndex=0
[LIMITER]
WaitBusyRenderer=false
EnableFPSLimit=true
FPSLimit=40.0
[INPUT]
//back
KeyReadConfig=8
//shift
KeyCombination=16
//f12
KeyUseEffect=123
//home
KeyFPSLimit=36
//num /       106
KeyShowFPS=106
KeyScreenshot=44
[ENGINE]
ForceAnisotropicFiltering=false
MaxAnisotropy=16
SkipShaderOptimization=false
[EFFECT]
UseOriginalPostProcessing=false
UseOriginalObjectsProcessing=false
EnableBloom=true
EnableAdaptation=true
EnableAmbientOcclusion=false
EnableDepthOfField=false
EnableDetailedShadow=false
EnableSunRays=true
EnableSkyLighting=true
[BLOOM]
Quality=1
AmountDay=1.2
AmountNight=1.8
BlueShiftAmountDay=1.0
BlueShiftAmountNight=1.9
ContrastDay=0.1
ContrastNight=0.1
[CAMERAFX]
LenzReflectionIntensityDay=1.0
LenzReflectionIntensityNight=1.0
LenzReflectionPowerDay=2.5
LenzReflectionPowerNight=2.5
[SSAO_SSIL]
UseIndirectLighting=false
UseComplexIndirectLighting=false
SamplingQuality=1
SamplingRange=0.6
FadeFogRangeDay=7.0
FadeFogRangeNight=7.0
SizeScale=0.5
SourceTexturesScale=0.7
FilterQuality=1
AOAmount=0.75
ILAmount=3.5
[NIGHTDAY]
DetectorDefaultDay=false
DetectorLevelDay=0.7
DetectorLevelNight=0.3
DetectorLevelCurve=1.1
[ADAPTATION]
ForceMinMaxValues=false
AdaptationSensitivity=0.1
AdaptationTime=0.2
AdaptationMin=0.2
AdaptationMax=1.0
[ENVIRONMENT]
DirectLightingIntensityDay=2.2
DirectLightingIntensityNight=1.9
DirectLightingCurveDay=1.1
DirectLightingCurveNight=1.1
DirectLightingDesaturationDay=0.2
DirectLightingDesaturationNight=0.8
SpecularAmountMultiplierDay=0.0
SpecularAmountMultiplierNight=0.0
SpecularPowerMultiplierDay=0.0
SpecularPowerMultiplierNight=0.0   
SpecularFromLightDay=0.0
SpecularFromLightNight=0.0
AmbientLightingIntensityDay=1.9
AmbientLightingIntensityNight=1.6
AmbientLightingCurveDay=2.0  
AmbientLightingCurveNight=1.5
AmbientLightingDesaturationDay=0.5
AmbientLightingDesaturationNight=0.5
PointLightingIntensityDay=1.5
PointLightingIntensityNight=1.9
PointLightingCurveDay=0.5
PointLightingCurveNight=0.5
PointLightingDesaturationDay=0.5
PointLightingDesaturationNight=0.5
FogColorMultiplierDay=1.5
FogColorMultiplierNight=1.2
FogColorCurveDay=0.5
FogColorCurveNight=0.8
ColorPowDay=1.3
ColorPowNight=1.5
[SKY]
Enable=true
StarsIntensity=1.5
StarsCurve=1.5
AuroraBorealisIntensity=0.5
AuroraBorealisCurve=0.5
CloudsIntensityDay=1.2
CloudsIntensityNight=0.8
CloudsCurveDay=0.8
CloudsCurveNight=0.5
CloudsDesaturationDay=0.8
CloudsDesaturationNight=0.5
GradientIntensity=0.4
GradientDesaturation=0.4
GradientTopIntensityDay=5.0
GradientTopIntensityNight=4.0
GradientTopCurveDay=3.5
GradientTopCurveNight=2.0
GradientMiddleIntensityDay=7.0
GradientMiddleIntensityNight=6.0
GradientMiddleCurveDay=3.0
GradientMiddleCurveNight=2.0
GradientHorizonIntensityDay=8.0
GradientHorizonIntensityNight=7.0
GradientHorizonCurveDay=2.5
GradientHorizonCurveNight=1.5
SunIntensity=0.5
SunDesaturation=0.5
SunCoronaIntensity=3.0
SunCoronaCurve=1.0
SunCoronaDesaturation=0.5
MoonIntensity=0.5
MoonCurve=1.0
MoonDesaturation=0.0
[OBJECT]
SubSurfaceScatteringMultiplierDay=0.5
SubSurfaceScatteringMultiplierNight=0.5
SubSurfaceScatteringMultiplierInterior=0.5
SubSurfaceScatteringPowerDay=15.6
SubSurfaceScatteringPowerNight=16.2
SubSurfaceScatteringPowerInterior=15.9
[LIGHTSPRITE]
IntensityDay=0.1
IntensityNight=0.5
CurveDay=0.1
CurveNight=0.1
[WINDOWLIGHT]
Intensity=17.5
Curve=7.5
[VOLUMETRICFOG]
IntensityDay=0.5
IntensityNight=0.5
CurveDay=1.0
CurveNight=1.0
[FIRE]
IntensityDay=1.0
IntensityNight=1.6
CurveDay=1.5
CurveNight=1.5
[COLORCORRECTION]
UsePaletteTexture=true
[SHADOW]
ShadowCastersFix=false
ShadowQualityFix=true
DetailedShadowQuality=0
UseBilateralShadowFilter=true
UseShadowFilter=true
ShadowObjectsFix=true
[DEPTHOFFIELD]
FadeTime=0.1
[RAYS]
SunRaysMultiplier=0.5
[SKYLIGHTING]
Quality=1
FilterQuality=2
AmbientMinLevel=0.2
author: uots
